glsa.title: GNU libmicrohttpd: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GNU libmicrohttpd, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: GNU libmicrohttpd is a small C library that is supposed to make it easy to run an HTTP server as part of another application.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GNU libmicrohttpd. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GNU libmicrohttpd users should upgrade to the latest version:
